entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Saint John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:41 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint John Airport 07:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -1.3°C
Wind: NNE 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain or ice pellets early this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending overnight then cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets early this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023
